item.description:
Greetings!

The weather has been changing every day and currently it says that there's a 30-50 percent chance of rain and the temps will be in the upper 50's. We'll keep th espeeds low on this ride and only do about 3 hours (not including stops).

We will depart from the Hess on Comm ave in newton (Rt 30) and head via backroads up to Rt 20 and take that to Rt 62 all the way to Clinton, MA for lunch at the "Old Timers" where we have gone many times before. After lunch we will ride to Barre, MA and North to 2A east to 70 South to Kimball's (The new one in Lancaster). From there, 117 east back to civilizaton.

Top speeds in the upper 40's to lower 50's - sprints are allowed as long as you don't mind waiting for others to catch up, we don't want anyone left behind!

Here's the Map that I'm going to *try* to follow - pretty simple - also changing the time to a 11am start and we should be back home by 5 or so.

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=2345+Commonwealth+Avenue,+Newton,+MA+02466+(Boston+Marriott+Newton+Hotel)&daddr=42.43135,-71.71054+to:Barre,+MA+to:42.55494,-72.06283+to:1543+...

While this is a real ride, it does have a big meal realated component - however this is a free ride (not requiring a touring membership) Such rides in the future will require such, excludiing breakfasts and other local meets.

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: Ride to Kimball's & Beyond!
